pr_title: Add QueryConfig to TableConfig with the query timeout setting

timeline.message:
Add QueryConfig to TableConfig with the query timeout setting

Following PR will use this setting as the query timeout

timeline.bodyText: JavaDoc would be helpful highlighting this is used for server query execution timeout on a per table level
timeline.author: siddharthteotia
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: I mean it will be used once it is wired up
replies.author: siddharthteotia

timeline.bodyText:
Will it be shown as "QueryConfig": null in the table config if it's null?
If yes, might be good to skip printing out this as "QueryConfig": null?
timeline.author: jackjlli

replies.bodyText: No, it won't. Check line 225, we only put it when it is not null.
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang
